title: 1 person wounded in shooting on Cleveland's West Side
content:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- A man was taken to the hospital Thursday night after being shot on the city's West Side.
Police released few details Thursday, saying the shooting occurred at about 10:10 p.m. on the 2200 block of West 93rd Street.
A 29-year-old man was taken to MetroHealth Medical Center. His condition is unknown.
No information on suspects was released. The shooting remains under investigation.
If you'd like to comment on this post, please visit the cleveland.com crime and courts comments section.
